name: He SiYuan
wishText: I have Prepared 7 Gifts for You! ;)
textInChatBox: I hope You are Happy Every Day! Yeee! May Many many Happy be With You...
text2: It's also the 69th Day since We've Known Each Other.
text3: It's Fantastic to Get along with You Every Day.
text4: I realize, I must do something
outroText: Hope we can always be this so sweet!
